originalText.text: If you are looking for the best immigration lawyer, it is Denis Petre! He is extremely knowledgeable and has a tremendous experience in immigration field. He is very dedicated and willing to help paying attention to tiny details of the whole picture, which proves his sharp mind. Our case seemed us stressful, but Denis Petre helped us to feel confident and well-prepared. He is very passionate about his cases, it is obvious that his main goal is to help people like us. We couldn't imagine our process without such a lawyer, he walked us through every little step. There are no words to describe how thankful our family is for his dedication, his wonderful results, and his passion. No need to say that he won our case. We highly recommend Denis Petre to anyone who needs an outstanding immigration lawyer!

originalText.text:
Mr. Denis Petre is very professional, respectful and talented lawyer. I had immigration court with him and I am 100% satisfied with his service. When I had preparation meetings with him before the court, I felt like I was speaking with a friend who was trying to help as much as possible.
During the court, he was well prepared and confident. He explained everything in details to me and patiently.  I’m really grateful to have him defending for my case. I Highly recommend Mr. Denis Petre for immigration courts.

originalText.text:
Hi, everyone! If you're looking for really professional immigration attorney so in my opinion Denis Petre is the best  attorney in NYC. And it's not just words, that's true! I had experience with other lawyer before and I'll tell you it's a huge difference!
Today I had a hearing in the court about my asylum case and I was granted very fast. Denis and paralegal Sergey did the great job, preparing my case and me to the hearing. I see that Denis and his team really want to help people, for them it's not just daily work. Denis Petre is very experienced lawyer, he is active, responsible and very talented. I saw how confident he was  in the court and he did it! He won!
I'm very grateful him for everything he's done. For me he's the hero today!
Also I want to thank paralegal Sergey for his great paperwork and desire to help.
I highly recommend Denis Petre as attorney at law. You no need any advertisement, just keep dooing your great job. Thank you again and may God bless you and your family!
